36: וַתִּתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Thou hast also given</n> לִ֖י מָגֵ֣ן <sup>4043 </sup> <n>me the shield</n> יִשְׁעֶ֑ךָ <sup>3468 </sup> <n>of thy salvation</n> וַעֲנֹתְךָ֖ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>defile</n> תַּרְבֵּֽנִי׃ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>hath made me great</n>
37: תַּרְחִ֥יב <sup>7337 </sup> <n>Thou hast enlarged</n> צַעֲדִ֖י <sup>6806 </sup> <n>my steps</n> תַּחְתֵּ֑נִי <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> מָעֲד֖וּ <sup>4571 </sup> <n>did not slip</n> קַרְסֻלָּֽי׃ <sup>7166 </sup> <n>under me so that my feet</n>
38: אֶרְדְּפָ֥ה <sup>7291 </sup> <n>I have pursued</n> אֹיְבַ֖י <sup>341 </sup> <n>mine enemies</n> וָאַשְׁמִידֵ֑ם <sup>8045 </sup> <n>and destroyed</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> אָשׁ֖וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>them and turned not again</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> כַּלּוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>until I had consumed</n>
39: וָאֲכַלֵּ֥ם <sup>398 </sup> <n>burn up</n> וָאֶמְחָצֵ֖ם <sup>4272 </sup> <n>them and wounded</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יְקוּמ֑וּן <sup>6965 </sup> <n>them that they could not arise</n> וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>yea they are fallen</n> תַּ֥חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> רַגְלָֽי׃ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>under my feet</n>

41: וְאֹ֣יְבַ֔י <sup>341 </sup> <n>of mine enemies</n> תַּ֥תָּה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Thou hast also given</n> לִּ֖י עֹ֑רֶף <sup>6203 </sup> <n>me the necks</n> מְשַׂנְאַ֖י <sup>8130 </sup> <n>them that hate</n> וָאַצְמִיתֵֽם׃ <sup>6789 </sup> <n>that I might destroy</n>
42: יִשְׁע֖וּ <sup>8159 </sup> <n>They looked</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> מֹשִׁ֑יעַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>but [there was] none to save</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[even] unto the LORD</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> עָנָֽם׃ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>but he answered</n>
43: וְאֶשְׁחָקֵ֖ם <sup>7833 </sup> <n>Then did I beat</n> כַּעֲפַר־ <sup>6083 </sup> <n>them as small as the dust</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> כְּטִיט־ <sup>2916 </sup> <n>them as the mire</n> חוּצ֥וֹת <sup>2351 </sup> <n>of the street</n> אֲדִקֵּ֖ם <sup>1854 </sup> <n>I did stamp</n> אֶרְקָעֵֽם׃ <sup>7554 </sup> <n>[and] did spread them abroad</n>
44: וַֽתְּפַלְּטֵ֔נִי <sup>6403 </sup> <n>Thou also hast delivered</n> מֵרִיבֵ֖י <sup>7379 </sup> <n>me from the strivings</n> עַמִּ֑י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of my people</n> תִּשְׁמְרֵ֙נִי֙ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>thou hast kept</n> לְרֹ֣אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>me [to be] head</n> גּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n> עַ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>a people</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> יָדַ֖עְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[which] I knew</n> יַעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>not shall serve</n>

48: הָאֵ֕ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>It [is] God</n> הַנֹּתֵ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>executes</n> נְקָמֹ֖ת <sup>5360 </sup> <n>vengeance</n> לִ֑י וּמוֹרִ֥יד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>me and that bringeth down</n> עַמִּ֖ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> תַּחְתֵּֽנִי׃ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n>
49: וּמוֹצִיאִ֖י <sup>3318 </sup> <n>And that bringeth me forth</n> מֵאֹֽיְבָ֑י <sup>341 </sup> <n>from mine enemies</n> וּמִקָּמַי֙ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>above them that rose up</n> תְּר֣וֹמְמֵ֔נִי <sup>7311 </sup> <n>thou also hast lifted me up on high</n> מֵאִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> חֲמָסִ֖ים <sup>2555 </sup> <n>me from the violent</n> תַּצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>against me thou hast delivered</n>
50: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֛ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> אוֹדְךָ֥ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>Therefore I will give thanks</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto thee O LORD</n> בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the heathen</n> וּלְשִׁמְךָ֖ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>unto thy name</n> אֲזַמֵּֽר׃ <sup>2167 </sup> <n>and I will sing praises</n>
